typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sourceDataBase as string,
		sourceTable as string,
		targetDataBase as string,
		targetTable as string,
		partitionCol as string,
		columns as string,
		emailURL as string,
		EmailId as string,
		sourceFileName as string,
		sourceDirectory as string,
		sourceContainer as string,
		destFileName as string,
		destDirectory as string,
		destContainer as string,
		TimeStamp as string,
		Value as string,
		Source as string,
		StartTime as string,
		EndTime as string,
		EpisodeId as string,
		EventId as string,
		State as string,
		EventType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> getJson
